destinations.name: Korea
destinations.description: Discover the Magic of South Korea

itinerary.title: Arrival & Traditional Seoul (Hanok, Palaces, and Culture)
activities: Morning: Arrive at Incheon Airport; take the AREX Express Train to Seoul Station (45 mins). Check into your Myeongdong hotel and grab coffee at a nearby cafe.

Afternoon: Rent a hanbok (traditional dress) for free entry to Gyeongbokgung Palace. Watch the Changing of the Royal Guard ceremony (10 AM or 2 PM), explore the palace grounds, and stroll to Bukchon Hanok Village for narrow alleys lined with Joseon-era houses and viewpoints. Stop for tea at a hanok cafe.

Evening: Head to Insadong for crafts, street performers, and Ssamziegil Mall's spiraling shops. Dinner at a night market like Myeongdong for tteokbokki (spicy rice cakes) and hotteok (sweet pancakes).

itinerary.title: Shopping & Modern Vibes (Myeongdong to Hongdae)
activities: Morning: Shop in Myeongdong for K-beauty at Olive Young or Innisfree (tax refund available). Visit Jogyesa Temple for its colorful lanterns.

Afternoon: Subway to Hongdae (Line 2, ~20 mins). Wander Hongdae Walking Street for street art, indie shops, and cafes like Thanks Nature (sheep-themed). Activate your Discover Seoul Pass for free entry to Trickeye Museum (optical illusions) or a K-pop dance class.
Evening: Catch buskers or a Nanta cooking show (ticket required). Dinner: Korean BBQ at Gogigo.

itinerary.title: Gangnam Glam & River Relax
activities: Morning: Subway to Gangnam (Line 2, ~15 mins). Stroll Garosu-gil for trendy cafes and boutiques; visit Starfield COEX Mall's stunning library and aquarium (free with Pass).
Afternoon: Explore Apgujeong Rodeo Street for luxury fashion and K-Star Road's K-pop statues. Walk Seoul Forest Park for deer spotting and cherry blossoms (seasonal).
Evening: Head to Yeouido Hangang Park for a picnic with 7-Eleven ramen cooked on outdoor machines. Watch the sunset over the Han River; optional Banpo Bridge Rainbow Fountain (8 PM, April‚ÄìOct).

itinerary.title: Markets, Art, & Departure
activities: Morning: Visit Dongdaemun Design Plaza (DDP) for futuristic architecture and exhibits. Walk Cheonggyecheon Stream for urban waterfalls and bridges.
Afternoon: Explore Gwangjang Market for street food like bindaetteok (mung bean pancakes) and knife-cut noodles. Shop for souvenirs at Namdaemun Market nearby.
Evening: Subway back to Seoul Station or Incheon Airport (allow 1‚Äì2 hours). Grab last-minute snacks at Lotte Mart.

itinerary.title: Arrival in Bangkok ‚Äì Transfer to Pattaya
activities: Meet & Greet at Suvarnabhumi Airport  Private transfer from Bangkok to Pattaya (Approx. 2 hours)
Evening: Alcazar Cabaret Show or free time at Pattaya Beach  Overnight stay in Pattaya

itinerary.title: Pattaya ‚Äì Coral Island Tour
activities: Breakfast at hotel  Full-day Coral Island (Koh Larn) tour  Speedboat ride  Optional water sports (parasailing, jet skiing ‚Äì at own expense)  Buffet lunch by the beach
Return to hotel in the afternoon
Free evening for shopping or explore Walking Street Pattaya  Overnight stay in Pattaya

itinerary.title: Pattaya to Bangkok ‚Äì City Tour
activities: Breakfast at hotel  Check-out and transfer back to Bangkok
En route visit to:  Gems Gallery  Tiger Park Pattaya (optional)
Bangkok City Tour:  Golden Buddha Temple (Wat Traimit)  Reclining Buddha (Wat Pho)  Drive through Rattanakosin Island
Evening: Optional Dinner Cruise on Chao Phraya River  Overnight stay in Bangkok

itinerary.title: Bangkok ‚Äì Shopping & Leisure
activities: Breakfast at hotel  Visit to Chatuchak Weekend Market (if weekend) or MBK Center / Siam Paragon / Platinum Mall
Optional: Visit Safari World or Dream World (theme parks)
Evening free to explore Asiatique the Riverfront night market  Overnight stay in Bangkok

itinerary.title: Departure
activities: Transfer to Bangkok International Airport for departure

destinations.name: Vietnam
destinations.description: Discover a breathtaking natural landscapes of Vietnam

itinerary.title: Arrival in Hanoi ‚Äì City Introduction
activities: Meet & Greet at Noi Bai International Airport  Transfer to hotel and check-in
Short orientation tour (if time permits):  Hoan Kiem Lake  Ngoc Son Temple  Explore the Old Quarter by cyclo (traditional rickshaw)

itinerary.title: Full-Day Hanoi City Tour
activities: Breakfast at hotel  Explore the highlights of Hanoi:  Ho Chi Minh Mausoleum (outside only on Mondays & Fridays)  Presidential Palace & One Pillar Pagoda  Temple of Literature ‚Äì Vietnam‚Äôs first university  Vietnam Museum of Ethnology or Hoa Lo Prison Museum
Afternoon: Local coffee break with Egg Coffee experience

itinerary.title: Hanoi ‚Äì Transfer to Ha Long Bay ‚Äì Overnight Cruise
activities: Early breakfast at hotel  Transfer to Ha Long Bay (approx. 2.5‚Äì3.5 hours)

Board your overnight cruise (3-star/4-star/5-star options)  Welcome drink and check-in to your cabin  Begin cruising through the spectacular limestone islands  Activities on board:  Sea kayaking  Visit to Sung Sot Cave or Titop Island  Cooking class on board  Sunset party and optional squid fishing

itinerary.title: Ha Long Bay ‚Äì Return to Hanoi
activities: Morning Tai Chi on the sundeck  Light breakfast, followed by brunch on board
Continue cruising before disembarking at the pier  Transfer back to Hanoi
Free evening for shopping or relaxing

itinerary.title: Departure
activities: Transfer to Noi Bai International Airport for departure

itinerary.title: Arrival in Boracay ‚Äì Welcome to Paradise
activities: Arrival at Caticlan Airport (or Kalibo Airport)  Private transfer to Boracay Island (Caticlan transfer takes about 15‚Äì20 minutes by boat)
Check-in at hotel (beachfront resorts or boutique hotels available)
Relax and enjoy the world-famous White Beach (swim, sunbathe, or enjoy water sports)

itinerary.title: Boracay Water Adventures
activities: Breakfast at hotel  Morning: Island hopping tour to explore the best beaches of Boracay, including:  Puka Shell Beach (peaceful and less crowded)  Crystal Cove for cave exploration and snorkeling  Magic Island (for cliff diving and swimming)
Afternoon: Optional water sports activities like Parasailing, Jet Skiing, or Snorkeling
Evening: Fire Dancing Show or casual stroll along the beach during sunset

itinerary.title: Island Exploration & Leisure
activities: Breakfast at hotel  Morning: Explore Mount Luho for a panoramic view of the island  Optional ATV ride to the summit
Afternoon: Relax at the beach or enjoy a spa treatment at one of the island‚Äôs luxury resorts
Evening: Enjoy the nightlife at White Beach, with beachside bars and restaurants

itinerary.title: Free Day ‚Äì Choose Your Adventure
activities: Breakfast at hotel  Free day to enjoy the activities that interest you most:  Snorkeling at Crocodile Island or Tambisaan Beach  Scuba diving or Flyfish ride (available through diving shops)  Visit the nearby Boracay Butterfly Garden  Sunset cruise with a private boat or group tour
Evening: Dinner at a beachfront restaurant (try fresh seafood!)

itinerary.title: Departure
activities: Transfer back to Caticlan or Kalibo Airport for your flight back

itinerary.title: Arrival & General Luna
activities: Arrive at Sayak Airport (Siargao)  Transfer to accommodation (General Luna area)
Explore Cloud 9 Boardwalk / surf viewing deck
Dinner by the beach / local restaurant

itinerary.title: Island Hopping Tour
activities: Breakfast - Join Tri-Island Tour:  Naked Island  Daku Island  Guyam Island

itinerary.title: Land Adventure Tour
activities: Breakfast  Visit:  Magpupungko Rock Pools (check tide schedule)  Maasin River (bent coconut tree swing)  Coconut Mountain View Deck  Tayangban Cave Pool
Dinner / Caf√© hopping in General Luna

itinerary.title: Sugba Lagoon Tour
activities: Breakfast  Full-day tour:  Sugba Lagoon (kayak, paddle board, dive platform)  Pamomoan Beach or Kawhagan Island

itinerary.title: Departure
activities: Early morning surf or sunrise walk

destinations.name: Cebu
destinations.description: Discover beautiful beaches, world-class diving spots, and historical landmarks such as Magellan‚Äôs Cross, Basilica del Santo Ni√±o, and Fort San Pedro.

itinerary.title: Arrive at Mactan‚ÄìCebu International Airport
activities: City Tour:  Magellan‚Äôs Cross  Basilica del Santo Ni√±o  Fort San Pedro  Taoist Temple  Heritage of Cebu Monument  Cebu Capitol & Tops Lookout (sunset view)

itinerary.title: Mactan Island Hopping
activities: Breakfast  Island Hopping Tour:  Hilutungan Island  Caohagan Island  Nalusuan Island
Return to hotel; free time or shopping (Ayala or SM Seaside)

itinerary.title: South Cebu Adventure (Oslob Area)
activities: Early morning departure (3:00‚Äì4:00 AM)  Oslob Whale Shark Watching üêã
Proceed to Sumilon Island Sandbar (optional lunch at Bluewater Resort)
Transfer to Moalboal (check-in for overnight stay)

itinerary.title: Moalboal & Kawasan Falls
activities: Breakfast  Sardine Run & Turtle Watching (Panagsama Beach) üê¢
Kawasan Falls Canyoneering Adventure (optional but recommended!)
Return to Cebu City or stay another night in Moalboal

itinerary.title: Departure
activities: Free time for souvenir shopping (Taboan Market / SM Cebu)

itinerary.title: Arrival & Siquijor Coastal Tour
activities: Meet & greet / hotel transfer  Check-in & rest
Coastal Tour Highlights:  St. Francis of Assisi Bell Tower (welcome stop)  Capilay Spring Park  Paliton Beach (sunset viewing)

itinerary.title: Island Inland Tour
activities: Full-Day Inland Tour:  Lazi Church & Convent (UNESCO heritage site)  Cambugahay Falls (swimming + rope swing)  Balete Tree & Fish Spa (centuries-old tree)  Salagdoong Beach (cliff jumping, swimming)  Guiwanon Spring Park (mangrove walk)
Return to hotel; free time / optional massage

itinerary.title: Free Day / Adventure Options
activities: Option 1: Relax at beach resort (Paliton or Solangon)
Option 2: Go snorkeling at Tubod Marine Sanctuary
Option 3: Short trip to nearby Apo Island (via Dumaguete day tour, optional)
Sunset dinner or drinks by the sea

itinerary.title: Departure
activities: Souvenir shopping (Siquijor Church area or San Juan shops)

destinations.name: Iloilo
destinations.description: Discover beautiful churches, such as the Molo Church and Miag-ao Church (a UNESCO World Heritage Site), and its vibrant festivals, especially the Dinagyang Festival, which celebrates devotion to the Santo Ni√±o and showcases Ilonggo culture and creativity.

itinerary.title: Arrival & Iloilo City Heritage Tour
activities: Arrival at Iloilo International Airport  Meet & greet / hotel transfer
City Heritage Tour Highlights:  Jaro Cathedral & Belfry  Molo Church (The Feminist Church)  Casa Mariquit (heritage house)  Calle Real (Old Downtown)  Iloilo River Esplanade (sunset walk)
Dinner at a local restaurant (e.g., Tatoy‚Äôs, Breakthrough)

itinerary.title: Guimaras Island Day Tour üçã
activities: Early breakfast  Take ferry from Iloilo to Guimaras Island (15 min)
Guimaras Tour Highlights:  Smallest Plaza  Trappist Monastery  Mango Plantation  Guisi Lighthouse & Beach  Alubihod Beach (swimming & lunch)  Souvenir shopping (mango products, local handicrafts)

itinerary.title: Southern Iloilo Countryside Tour
activities: Breakfast  Full-Day Tour:  Garin Farm (San Joaquin) ‚Äì ‚ÄúStairway to Heaven‚Äù viewpoint  Miag-ao Church (UNESCO World Heritage Site)  Tigbauan Church  San Joaquin Cemetery
Dinner at Iloilo Business Park or Smallville

itinerary.title: Departure
activities: Souvenir shopping (La Paz Market, Festive Walk Mall)

destinations.name: Bohol
destinations.description: Stunning natural beauty, rich history, and warm hospitality. It is most famous for the Chocolate Hills, a unique geological formation of over 1,200 symmetrical hills that turn brown during the dry season, resembling giant chocolate mounds.

itinerary.title: Arrival & Panglao Tour
activities: Arrive in Bohol (Panglao Airport)  Meet & greet / hotel transfer
Half-Day Panglao Tour:  Hinagdanan Cave  Dauis Church  Bohol Bee Farm (organic food tasting & souvenir shop)  Alona Beach sunset walk

itinerary.title: Countryside Tour (Chocolate Hills & Tarsiers)
activities: Full-Day Countryside Tour:  Blood Compact Shrine  Baclayon Church (optional museum visit)  Tarsier Sanctuary (Corella)  Loboc River Cruise (lunch included)  Man-made Forest (Bilar)  Chocolate Hills (Carmen view deck)

itinerary.title: Island Hopping Tour
activities: Early breakfast  Island Hopping Highlights:  Dolphin Watching (early morning)  Balicasag Island (snorkeling, turtle sanctuary)  Virgin Island Sandbar
Return to hotel; relax or swim at Alona Beach

itinerary.title: Departure
activities: Souvenir shopping (island delicacies, peanut kisses, etc.)
Transfer to airport or ferry port

testimonials.name: Eric Hernandez
testimonials.text: The BKK-Pattaya tour arranged by Zach and Kaii travel tours is very well-organized and detailed. The drivers are very friendly, despite of language barrier their translator app is effective making the tour a hassle-free. All of the tour spots are worth going especially the Temple of Truth.

testimonials.name: Jhester Sta Ana
testimonials.text: Absolutely loved the 3-day Paris Essence Tour with Zack & Kaii Travel and Tours! The blend of iconic sights like the Eiffel Tower and Louvre, paired with sustainable touches like the solar-powered Seine cruise, made it unforgettable. The crepe-making workshop was a delightful highlight, and the eco-conscious guides added such depth. Perfect for all ages‚Äîhighly recommend!

testimonials.name: Janwell Merana
testimonials.text: Amazing service! They helped us plan a family trip to Japan that exceeded all our expectations. We'll definitely be booking with them again.

seo.metaDescription: Discover amazing travel destinations with Zack and Kaii Travel and Tours. Book your dream vacation with our personalized travel planning services.
seo.keywords: travel agency, vacation packages, travel planning, destinations, tours, flights, hotels
